ColorTK 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    Standard

    Function reference

    Color Mutation

    Brighten()
    Fixe saturation at 100% and light at 50%.
    Colorize()
    Fixe saturation at 100%.
    Darken()
    Fixe light at 25%.
    MutateColorParameter()
    Modify a color
    Pastelize()
    Fixe light at 75%.
    Tarnished()
    Fixe saturation at 25%.

    Format Convertion

    Col2Hex()
    Convert a color in hexadecimal format.
    Col2Hsl()
    Convert a color in HSL format.
    Col2Rgb()
    Convert a color in to RGB format.
    ConvertColorFormat()
    Convert a color format.
    GetColorFormat()
    Get format of a color
    Hex2Hsl()
    Convert a color in hexadecimal to HSL.
    Hex2Rgb()
    Convert a color in hexadecimal to RGB.
    Hsl2Hex()
    Convert a color in HSL to hexadecimal.
    Hsl2Rgb()
    Convert a color in HSL to RGB.
    Rgb2Hex()
    Convert a color in RGB to hexadecimal format.
    Rgb2Hsl()
    Convert a color in RGB to HSL format.

    Format Check

    IsCol()
    Check if a color is in R color format.
    IsHex()
    Check if a color is in hexadecimal color format.
    IsHsl()
    Check if a color is in HSL color format.
    IsRgb()
    Check if a color is in RGB color format.

    Palette

    ggPalette()
    Plot a color palette.
    Hue()
    Create an Hue palette.
    Blues()
    Create a Blues palette
    BrBG()
    Create a BrBG palette
    BuGn()
    Create a BuGn palette
    BuPu()
    Create a BuPu palette
    GnBu()
    Create a GnBu palette
    Greens()
    Create a Greens palette
    Greys()
    Create a Greys palette
    OrRd()
    Create a OrRd palette
    Oranges()
    Create a Oranges palette
    PiYg()
    Create a PiYg palette
    PrGn()
    Create a PrGn palette
    PuBu()
    Create a PuBu palette
    PuBuGn()
    Create a PuBuGn palette
    PuOr()
    Create a PuOr palette
    PuRd()
    Create a PuRd palette
    Purples()
    Create a Purples palette
    RdBu()
    Create a RdBu palette
    RdGy()
    Create a RdBu palette
    RdPu()
    Create a RdPu palette
    RdYlBu()
    Create a RdYlBu palette
    RdYlGn()
    Create a RdYlGn palette
    Reds()
    Create a Reds palette
    Spectral()
    Create a Spectral palette
    YlGn()
    Create a YlGn palette
    YlGnBu()
    Create a YlGnBu palette
    YlOrBr()
    Create a YlOrBr palette
    YlOrRd()
    Create a YlOrRd palette
    cividis()
    Create a cividis palette
    inferno()
    Create a inferno palette
    magma()
    Create a magma palette
    mako()
    Create a mako palette
    plasma()
    Create a plasma palette
    rocket()
    Create a rocket palette
    turbo()
    Create a turbo palette
    viridis()
    Create a viridis palette
